channel.title: Need help getting server online and maybe help with admin
channel.description: Hi i kinda need help getting my server online i think iv tried just about everything i can think of..... like i can get on it but when my friend trys it says "server must be down" so how do i do that?? Also if you know how, how do i make myself an admin for my server on testscape¿? I think i have tried every thing there too but probably not please help me i realy need it...... :( ♣ ♠

item.title: Need help getting server online and maybe help with admin
item.dc:creator: @mail1 mail`
item.description:
@mail1 wrote:

Go to client.java,
search for admin list

should see some thing like

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

In this case, change admin to your name on the game

Read full topic
